languages.text: "Что... что вы наделали?! Это был мой единственный шанс выжить, а вы... вы обрекли меня". {n}По щекам Идиры текут слезы, но в ее глазах нет ярости или обиды — лишь отрешенность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Что... что вы наделали?! Это был мой единственный шанс выжить, а вы... вы обрекли меня." {n}По щекам Идиры текут слезы, но в ее глазах нет ярости или обиды — лишь отрешенность. Она сдалась.{/n}

languages.text: "What... what have you done? This was my only chance, the only way I could live, and you... you've doomed me." {n}Tears stream down her cheeks, but there is no rage or resentment in her eyes — only detachment from reality.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Что... что вы наделали?! Это был мой единственный шанс выжить, а вы... вы обрекли меня". {n}По щекам Идиры текут слезы, но в ее глазах нет ярости или обиды — лишь отрешенность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What... what have you done? This was my only chance, the only way I could live, and you... you've doomed me." {n}Tears stream down her cheeks, but there is no rage or resentment in her eyes — only detachment from reality.{/n}

"What... what have you done? This was my only chance, the only way I could live, and you... you've doomed me." {n}Tears stream down her cheeks, but there is no rage or resentment in her eyes — only detachment from reality.{/n}

languages.text: “你……你这是在干什么？这是我唯一的机会，我唯一能活下来的办法，可你……你却亲手判了我死刑。”{n}眼泪顺着伊迪拉的脸颊流下来，但她的眼中没有任何愤怒或怨恨，仿佛这个世界已经与她无关一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What... what have you done? This was my only chance, the only way I could live, and you... you've doomed me." {n}Tears stream down her cheeks, but there is no rage or resentment in her eyes — only detachment from reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你……你这是在干什么？这是我唯一的机会，我唯一能活下来的办法，可你……你却亲手判了我死刑。”{n}眼泪顺着伊迪拉的脸颊流下来，但她的眼中没有任何愤怒或怨恨，仿佛这个世界已经与她无关一样。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Qué...? ¿Qué ha hecho? Esta era mi única oportunidad, la única forma de que sobreviviera, y usted... me ha condenado». {n}Las lágrimas caen por sus mejillas, pero no hay enfado ni resentimiento en sus ojos, solo un distanciamiento con la realidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What... what have you done? This was my only chance, the only way I could live, and you... you've doomed me." {n}Tears stream down her cheeks, but there is no rage or resentment in her eyes — only detachment from reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué...? ¿Qué ha hecho? Esta era mi única oportunidad, la única forma de que sobreviviera, y usted... me ha condenado». {n}Las lágrimas caen por sus mejillas, pero no hay enfado ni resentimiento en sus ojos, solo un distanciamiento con la realidad.{/n}

languages.text: "Was ... was habt Ihr getan? Das war meine einzige Chance, meine einzige Möglichkeit zu leben, und Ihr ... Ihr habt mich dem Untergang geweiht." {n}Tränen strömen ihre Wangen hinab, doch es liegt keine Wut in ihren Augen, kein Groll — nur eine Distanz zur Realität.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What... what have you done? This was my only chance, the only way I could live, and you... you've doomed me." {n}Tears stream down her cheeks, but there is no rage or resentment in her eyes — only detachment from reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was ... was habt Ihr getan? Das war meine einzige Chance, meine einzige Möglichkeit zu leben, und Ihr ... Ihr habt mich dem Untergang geweiht." {n}Tränen strömen ihre Wangen hinab, doch es liegt keine Wut in ihren Augen, kein Groll — nur eine Distanz zur Realität.{/n}

languages.text: 「何を…何をしたの？これが私の唯一のチャンスで、唯一の生きる道だったのに。あなたは…私を破滅させたのよ」{n}涙が彼女の頬を伝うが、その目に怒りや憤りはない。ただ虚無感があるだけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What... what have you done? This was my only chance, the only way I could live, and you... you've doomed me." {n}Tears stream down her cheeks, but there is no rage or resentment in her eyes — only detachment from reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「何を…何をしたの？これが私の唯一のチャンスで、唯一の生きる道だったのに。あなたは…私を破滅させたのよ」{n}涙が彼女の頬を伝うが、その目に怒りや憤りはない。ただ虚無感があるだけだ。{/n}

languages.text: « Que... qu'avez-vous fait ? C'était mon seul espoir, ma seule chance de mener une vie normale et vous... vous m'avez condamnée. » {n}Des larmes coulent sur ses joues, mais vous ne percevez aucune colère ni aucun ressentiment dans son regard... juste une indifférence à la réalité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What... what have you done? This was my only chance, the only way I could live, and you... you've doomed me." {n}Tears stream down her cheeks, but there is no rage or resentment in her eyes — only detachment from reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Que... qu'avez-vous fait ? C'était mon seul espoir, ma seule chance de mener une vie normale et vous... vous m'avez condamnée. » {n}Des larmes coulent sur ses joues, mais vous ne percevez aucune colère ni aucun ressentiment dans son regard... juste une indifférence à la réalité.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne... Ne yaptın sen? Bu, benim tek şansımdı. Yaşamamın tek yoluydu ve sen... Beni mahvettin."{n}Yanaklarından yaşlar süzülüyor ama gözlerinde öfke veya dargınlık yok, sadece gerçeklikten kopmuş gibi gözüküyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What... what have you done? This was my only chance, the only way I could live, and you... you've doomed me." {n}Tears stream down her cheeks, but there is no rage or resentment in her eyes — only detachment from reality.{/n}
